original_title: The McKameys: The Old Path Live
overview: With a record-breaking 13 number-one songs on the Singing News charts, The McKameys have performed their unique brand of Southern Gospel since 1954, retaining their perfect harmonies and sincere message ever since. This compilation of performances includes "Jesus Is With Me Every Where I Go," "That's How I Got Saved," "Resurrection Morn," "The Old Stream," "Altogether Lovely," "I Know Something About God's Grace" and "I Am a Soldier Today."
title: The McKameys: The Old Path Live
